text_block_list.text: A day off. Accompanying Fine Motion as her guardian, the two of us headed to the mountain behind the school.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fuu… haa! Yeah, the forest air is refreshing, isn't it? The smell reminds me of the morning dew in my garden.

text_block_list.name: SP Commander (phone)
text_block_list.text: "…well then, Trainer-sama. Sorry to impose upon you but, in regards to Her Highness, you have my sincere thanks."

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufufu, thank you, Trainer. It's precisely because I'm with you that I was able to have some free time and come here.
choice_data_list: By the way, where are we headed?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh! That's a great question, isn't it? Fufufu, you see, today-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …there isn't really a destination! It's just that I thought it would be lovely to take a walk with you surrounded by nature like this.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Well, but… you see? You never know, something special might happen, perhaps.
She definitely seems to be hiding something, but let's leave that aside for now. Let's just keep walking together with Fine Motion, mindlessly-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Fuu, thanks for the meal. Yep, the quality of this Deluxe Cold Noodle Bentou is quite good, if I do say so myself.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: That's true. All we can hear are the sound of this small river, birds, and insects… it's like we're in a strange new world.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …it kind of reminds me of a story from my childhood. The scene where the hero and the kidnapped princess escape through the forest…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: And then, the fearsome dragon comes to take back the princess, suddenly attacking. They were deep in the forest, just like us.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Fufu. It almost feels like, a dragon could appear at any moment.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: But- if it did? If something like that really did happen… Would you… protect me?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Really?! That makes me happy! Aa, somehow that makes me kind of wish a dragon would appear-
(ROOOOOOOOAR…!)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Ah! Trainer, look! From the river…!

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: ROOOOOOOOOAR!!!!
What appeared from the water was… something that looked like an old drawing of a Tyrannosaurus with two wings sitting awkwardly on its back-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -It's a dragon! Oh no, it's coming right for us!
It might have been my imagination, but its movements seemed unnatural or forced… It was even standing there posing with its arms in the shape of a cross…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Aaah! At this rate… just like this… It'll turn us in to tasty treats!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Uu, won't someone become our hero and defeat this fearsome dragon…?

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: ROOOOAR!!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Do your best, Hero! The glory of victory is in your hands!
And so… our not-so-violent scuffle to see who could outlast the other began. After 5 to 10 minutes-

text_block_list.name: Dragon
text_block_list.text: Guaaaaa…!! You got me…!!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Splendid! It was an amazing fight, Trainer!
But, at that moment. The defeated dragon stood again, and abruptly took off its head… wait, took off its head!?

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Fufufu… Congratulations.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufu… 1, 2-!

text_block_list.name: Fine & Commander
text_block_list.text: You got punk'd!
…well, I suspected as much.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufufu… a little while ago, remember how we returned that lost cat to its owner?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: At that time, remember how wonderful it was? So I tried preparing something similar for today!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …what did you think of our surprise prank?
choice_data_list: I suppose I was surprised… but it was fun.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: That's good! That makes rehearsing it at school worth it!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: On top of that, you kept your promise, didn't you? When the dragon appeared, you protected me.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Fufu. Thanks.
After that, the 3 of us continued walking… We headed back after we enjoyed the view from the summit.
-Oh! Welcome, little lady. Do you want the usual?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Yeah, if you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fuu… it kind of feels like we're home. Good work today, both of you.
choice_data_list: Well yeah, there was a battle…
Well yeah, there was a battle…

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Fu… I'm used to this. In the past, Her Highness awarded me a hand-made medal for my dragon act.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Fufu, that's a nostalgic topic. If I remember correctly, the "Worked Hard At Being A Dragon Award". I think I made it from flowers, branches, and clovers…

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: That's right. In that case I should prepare something for Trainer. How does the "Dragon Slayer Cross" sound?

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Congratulations. But it's still nothing compared to the glory of my "Enthusiastic Witch Performance" and "Holy Castle Role" medals…
-Order up. 3 lightly salted, large size.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Huh?! I don't think I ordered corn and bamboo shoot as toppings…
Isn't this "The Usual" for you? It's on the house today, so just enjoy.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ! Thank you very much! Then, with pleasure.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …"The usual," huh? Not special, just the usual.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -Fufu. At some point, eating ramen and talking with my friends like this just became "the usual," didn't it?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …For me, it's possible that-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: No, nothing. -Today was a really fun day, wasn't it?
